attributes.action: ask the Queen to dissolve Parliament forthwith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM should in the wake of MP's Expenses shame ask the Queen to dissolve Parliament so that her subjects can get rid of these parasites and start a new Parliament with new Honourable members

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
